definition: to be more scared than hurt (idiom)/to get through a daunting experience without mishap
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm

sentences.english: A bottle of spirits was launched in his direction but narrowly missed.
sentences.chinese: 向他投擲了一瓶烈酒，但有驚無險。

sentences.english: If you work in most other fields, you're likely nervous but not panic-stricken.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是在其他領域工作，那麼你可能是有驚無險。

sentences.english: Luckily, it was a near miss, so we didn't encounter any problems.
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是，有驚無險，我們沒有碰到任何問題。
